author: Ildefonso Ortiz
title: Coronavirus Cases Rise 17 Percent in Mexico over Easter
description: Mexican health officials announced a 17 percent spike in confirmed cases of the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) over the Easter weekend. The sharp rise comes after authorities acknowledged they only tested 36,594 nationwide since the pandemic arrived.
content:
Mexican health officials announced a 17 percent spike in confirmed cases of the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) over the Easter weekend. The sharp rise comes after authorities acknowledged they only tested 36,594 nationwide since the pandemic arrived.
